bukkit.Vandolis
Class ShopItem

java.lang.Object
  bukkit.Vandolis.ShopItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShopItemStack
public class ShopItem
extends java.lang.Object

Class that is the base item used by the economy. Eventually gets added directly to the players inventory.

Author:
Vandolis
